item.title: Crypto Projects Written in Golang
item.description: I first started developing in Golang back in 2012 upon version 1 release & since its initial release, Golang has become quite popular with several major crypto & blockchain projects. This is a quick overview of the projects which have sparked my interest firstly starting with a quote providing some insight into why Golang has had success in the blockchain space. Golang is a systems programming language for building networked, distributed services.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
